description: Try our easy to follow Quick & Easy Gravy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quick & Easy Gravy Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the flour and a tiny amount of water to a smooth paste, then stir into the tin, using a balloon whisk to avoid any lumps. Cook gently, stirring all the time, for 5 minutes, then taste and season with salt and black pepper, if needed. Strain through a sieve and serve in a warmed jug or gravy boat.
